name: Expenditure
description: Expenditure is a personal finance tracker that helps users manage their income and expenses effectively. It provides a simple and intuitive interface to add income sources, track expenses, and generate detailed reports categorized by income, expense, and categories. It also supports theme toggling like dark mode.
features: Add income with date (in Source tab)
View reports based on income, expenses, and categories (in Reports tab)
User-friendly navigation with Sidebar and Header

auth.login: Users must log in with a username and password.
auth.logout: Logout is accessible from the top-right profile/settings icon.

ExpenseTab.description: Module for logging daily expenses with amount, category, and date.

howTo.addExpense: Go to the 'Expense' tab, input the amount, select a category and date, and click 'Add'.

howToLogout: Click on the user icon or settings dropdown at the top-right and select 'Logout' to exit the session.
howToAddPicture: While adding an expense or income, use the upload button to attach a relevant image (like receipts).
howToAddCategory: Navigate to the 'Categories' section (if available) and click on 'Add New Category' to create custom categories for your expenses.
howToAddExpense: Go to the 'Expense' section, input the amount, category, and date, then click 'Add' to save the expense.
